website_summaries.verdict: An industrial-quality double-knuckle camera suction mount that works with almost any camera.
pros: Has a GoPro mount for GoPros and a 1/4-20” tripod mount
Suction grip is strong enough to withstand gravel roads and high freeway speeds
cons: Like most suction mounts, it doesn’t work on most dashboards because of their textured surfaces
You’ll need an adapter for that

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Solid. Stable Mount. A+ from me.
customer_reviews.text: At this price I was skeptical about what the quality would be. So I ordered one. Loved it enough to come back and buy 3 more a week later. You really can’t go wrong here. In the past I have had terrible experiences with economy suction cup mounts. And I swore that I would only ever use RAM Brand in future. The Panavise is not as high quality as the RAM line of product, but seriously at this price it is an outstanding buy. Super stable. Nice tight feel when GoPro is mounted. I’m a picky buyer and this product gets A+ from me.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiszen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the GoPro firmly attached
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Took a short vid of it attached to my car. This was only up to 60 mph and attached to the back because I wanted to record the sweet sound of the VR6. Plan to do a track day in the future and see how it does with speeds up to 140mph.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ens

customer_reviews.title: Great GoPro Mount
customer_reviews.text: This kit is well worth the price. It's the most solid mount I have, except for the older style Panavise mount that I got with a used GoPro Hero 4. That mount is still just as solid as this one, but not quite as versatile. There are extensions available for other Panavise mounts that should fit this perfectly. I haven't tried them, but they look to be part of the same system.
customer_reviews.author: NLS

customer_reviews.title: These are the most amazing suction cup mounts you can buy
customer_reviews.text: These are the most amazing suction cup mounts you can buy. I use it to jerry rig a remote control mount for my car. I have another one that is actually used for a camera. There is a smidge of wobble, but it's not noticeable with the shorty mount. The longer one does have a bit more wobble, so watch out for that.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Holds to the dash really well
customer_reviews.text: I will star by say I love this suction camera holder. It held to my dash like it should even while going down dirt roads in Nebraska storm spotting!!. It can be a little hard to adjust on the go, but that could have been me too. I can be a little challenging to remain perfectly calm when you are next to a tornado. Overall though this thing is a champ!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: Study and well built
customer_reviews.text: Though I really like the way its built and its sturdiness but one complain that I have is lack of features to rotate the gopro once its mounted. Otherwise great value for money and its built like tank. It hold on my car front bumper driving 60 miles per hour. No problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: T Dorjee

customer_reviews.title: ... the short suction cup mount (13101) and it works great for action cameras or anything with a 1/4" x ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the short suction cup mount (13101) and it works great for action cameras or anything with a 1/4" x 20 mount. I typically have cameras mounted inside and outside of moving vehicles to capture various angles. On smooth surfaces this mount held on like it was glued down. I am very happy with the performance and will be purchasing more of these Panavise mounts in the future.
customer_reviews.author: ichiban

customer_reviews.title: Great Dashcam mount for GoPro type cameras
customer_reviews.text: I've used Panavise products for years, When looking for a 1/4-20 suction mount to use for a GoPro knockoff, I came across this. The price was great and the brand sold me. It works great for the windshield. I do want to try it on the outside of the truck with a safety strap just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Doug K

customer_reviews.title: After Using on 2 Months Long Road Trip..
customer_reviews.text: I've used several different suction cup mounts but this one was definitely the best. You can position the camera in almost any direction and position and it holds tightly. I've attached it on moving trains and cars on a backpacking and road trips and it worked very well. However, it is quite heavy so be aware!
customer_reviews.author: Arwen

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sturdy, and a must have in every kit
customer_reviews.text: Extremely versatile tool that is essential in every film maker kit. I’ve used this to get shots I would have otherwise never been able to achieve. This product combines with a DJI OSMO pocket or insta 360 go can get you some really great shots.
customer_reviews.author: Joey O

customer_reviews.title: Best you'll find for mounting a cell phone on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Best you'll find for mounting a cell phone on a motorcycle. It WILL hold it tight Make sure to buy the Reti-CAM Smartphone Tripod Mount XL - Metal Universal Smart Phone Tripod Adapter - XL Size (2.75" to 3.6"), Black with this kit checking the size of the phone first. You may have to use a phone with top mount buttons or alter the rubber slightly so that it doesn't press on the phone buttons. I did the alteration and it worked great, just took a little finesse.
customer_reviews.author: wade hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Does not ship with what is advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Ships WITHOUT the GoPro camera adapter GP 3 Axis Camera Adapter. Specs say it is included - it does not come with it. I ordered it twice and am returning it - can not use it without adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Check for missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Beware missing parts! Received 3 of these from Amazon and all 3 where missing parts. This is a 3-1 kit to make 3 configurations but without the missing parts you can only use it in one configuration. Returned all 3 and purchased one direct from Panavise which included all advertised parts.
customer_reviews.author: joseph capra

customer_reviews.title: Best suction Mounts
customer_reviews.text: this is my first camera suction mount but not my first Panavise suction mount (3 cell phone mounts) the design of the suction section gets a great vacuum that really holds on my Cell phone holder in my gambler 500 vehicle held up to a lot of off roading and temperature swing without releasing i can not recommend these enough.
customer_reviews.author: Livre Libre

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After waiting for sooooo long for this thing to arrive it didn’t even last me 1 day Flew off right away along with my action camera. I couldn’t be more disappointed not only because now I don’t have a camera but this was a waist of money and time I do not recommend don’t buy it is not worth it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Solid suction and very stable
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a cross-country trip to video our adventures. We stuck it to the windshield and used a phone mount to clamp the phone. It proved to not shake at all. I was really impressed with this suction cup mount. It also releases very quickly and easily. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Churchill

customer_reviews.title: THIS THING SUCKS!!!  IT'S GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to replace a dash cam mount. The original mount would constantly fall off, almost weekly, most likely due to temperature changes and whatever but this one has been on for over a month with crazy hot (+100) temps and still holding strong. It was a little difficult to tighten the knob after the camera is screwed in but it wasn't impossible. I definitely would purchase this if you need something to stay in place for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: T. Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and bargain
customer_reviews.text: Very strong suction cup! I purchased this to mount a McNett Flux LED light on it and it works great. I can mount the light horizontally on any smooth surface and it holds. For reference the light weighs 24 oz. Sorry the photo I posted is rotated.
customer_reviews.author: jtfreelancer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for a trip to Moab a that friends and I were doing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our Moab trip and wanted something that would hold my Gopro to the windshield and not fall off well doing some hard four Wheeling it worked perfect never fell off and with the image stabilization turn on I got good video's.
customer_reviews.author: DevilDog 3/7

customer_reviews.title: Super-strong
customer_reviews.text: Have not had a chance to use this on the outside of the car yet - but it REALLY holds tight to a smooth, clean surface - lots of confidence in it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Does not fall off and vibration free.
customer_reviews.text: Stays on the inside of my windshield without falling off and does not extra vibration to my GoPro Session5 camera. Materials appear of good quality and is designed well. No problems
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Compatible with standard 1/4-20 mounting stud
customer_reviews.text: Panavise as always made quality products and this one will not disappoint you. I setup my AKASO EK7000 and the suction cup holds well. Note that this comes with a 1/4-20 mounting stud, depending on your needs, you may have to do some modifications
customer_reviews.author: amarevw

customer_reviews.title: Work great so far
customer_reviews.text: Work great so far , giving it a four due to not having it too long , so we see how it works out , very adjustable, little hard to get off window after sticking it on , but thats ok . I like it , well worth the price. If it fails in near future I get back at ya
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Panavise is good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks and holds...Just like it is supposed to. Good quality and price. I use this with a cell phone clamp and it works well. Some may need the model with more pivot points.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is, by far, the most complicated - and useful - accessory that I have for my cameras. I primarily mount the cameras to my cars and this has saved me a ton of effort. My other mounts always seem to be this close || to perfect and then run out of adjustment. Not so here! It hasn't come loose yet.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Perkins

customer_reviews.title: A most excellent mount.
customer_reviews.text: I had this mounted to my truck hood for a trip about 4 days or so. It never moved once. Freeway speeds of 75-80 or so. Most impressive was the 48 miles of mixed smooth and bumpy dirt road I drove at about 20-45mph depending on section. Sony action cam on it. The dirt road had nothing on this mount. When u get a second cam this is the mount I'll buy again for certain. Outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Kryptonite

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my Gear 360 when drag racing, I stick it on the top of my car on the sunroof glass and it's solid
customer_reviews.author: K. Siddiq

customer_reviews.title: Solid Build...
customer_reviews.text: An excellent and well made mount (single knuckle). The suction cup securely holds the device and camera with complete confidence, no matter the conditions you throw at it. The build quality is excellent. The mount is metal with plastic components where required (handles & base mount). I can certainly recommend this mount.
customer_reviews.author: Fishing For Life

customer_reviews.title: This mount is simply the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: This mount is simply the best on the market. The holding power is absolutely amazing. The quality has not been spared, very high. Rugged and durable for the toughest of conditions. I would not hesitate to purchase this or any other Panavise product, visit the website they also gave variety of mounts for your phone as well.
customer_reviews.author: WRX

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, strong recommendation
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely well made. Attached to Asako V50, attaches to car and can run on highway no problem. We'll see how long it lasts, but strong recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Barclay

customer_reviews.title: Overkill Dash Cam Mount
customer_reviews.text: I use this as an Dash Cam mount for my Mobius Maxi Action Cam. Has not budged or shown any signs of losing its grip. Easy to use and has a strong suction.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Nice mount
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my waylens horizon race camera. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: FV

customer_reviews.title: Not good suction
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it. The suction was not good.
customer_reviews.author: Being G Tv

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT come with the "included" go pro mount.
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed pretty decent overall, but I bought it for my gopro and it didn't come with the mount for it.
customer_reviews.author: J.Brig

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this I use it on my work truck and not once it’s come off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Secure and versatile mounting for small action cams.
customer_reviews.text: I use this mount to secure an action cam to the fuel tank on a motorcycle. The mount is a lot more secure than I expected and allows me to capture great video of canyon and track days. This mount is great on any non porous, flat surface!
customer_reviews.author: Eric_50

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to hang a security camera upside down ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hang a security camera upside down from a glass shelf. Been hanging for a couple months now without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tinyt1553

customer_reviews.title: 7.5g STRONG AND AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: 7.5g rated. There is not a better GoPro mount out there. Swivels whichever direction you need and the suction cup holds strong under 7.5g's.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Strong suction, great price, good flexibility and range of movement
customer_reviews.text: Well designed product. I noticed the suction is quite a bit stronger than some industrial glass-moving suction cups that I have. Works really well with small action camera (DBPower, Gopro, etc). I have not yet tried with SLR but feel comfortable attempting with sensible backup restraint.
customer_reviews.author: N. Chapple

customer_reviews.title: Panavise ActionGrip 13101 Shorty Suction Cup Camera Mount (Matte Black)
customer_reviews.text: I can only use it sideways not facing to the front of my car.
customer_reviews.author: -wsh-

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: Used to making video on rally car, after bad experiences with similar products. This Panavise camera mount is the best I have ever seen. Warm or cold, water or dry, the suction cup works really well. Use on glass or not curved metallic surface, outside the car, but not on most internal dash because irregular surface.
customer_reviews.author: NI

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: In the little time I've had it I can tell this thing is going to work out great, the huge suction cup doesn't make me nervous mounting on the outside of the vehicle for video
customer_reviews.author: foff667

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my car windshield with go pro and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Crain

customer_reviews.title: The one
customer_reviews.text: Want to keep your camera, feel confident about the mounting, get the right angle? This is it! I've done over 130 mph with this mount. I first saw it used by multiple major car reviewers and racers. That convinced me. Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: JFK IITop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is like welding your mount to your car. Solid! Used it on a trip to Colorado from Texas, and did a timelapse. It was rock solid the entire trip!
customer_reviews.author: jesmo5

customer_reviews.title: Holds >65mph NO PROBLEM
customer_reviews.text: I have two other versions of panavise suction grips. The other's have held my gopro's and sony action cam at >65mph without problems. Super easy to attach and detach. Much better than many cheaper made-in china knock offs. I wouldn't trust any of my expensive gear with anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonjeepguy

customer_reviews.title: My Review
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these and love them. I haven't found anything I didn't like. They are solid, well built, don't wiggle like some do when driving. They are easy to install and remove and the parts can be switch around to make it shorter or longer. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Keithmj

customer_reviews.title: Easily held a handicam and will have no problem with
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of choices for these types of suction cup mounts, but I read a review of this one for professionals and I have to agree--pro quality product. Easily held a handicam and will have no problem with GoPro
customer_reviews.author: JCR

customer_reviews.title: Best out there.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a GoPro for $400 and I was afraid to mount it to my car. I saw this mount on another website ranked as the the best and I don't have one complaint. I just use a wet paper towel and wipe off the spot where I am going to mount and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Dwjordanjr

customer_reviews.title: Sucks A lot
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. Mounted a Go Pro on each and mounted on front and rear glass of car. Stays in place even off road. Hint: Don't place over rear defroster strips, suction will be lost.
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: Not for car dashboard use.
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that this unit can adhere to any surface...but as in many cases, it can't be used on a porous surface like a car dashboard without another accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Solid and dependable
customer_reviews.text: I've always had good luck with Panavise suction cup mounts. This shorty mount is nice and compact for when you don't need to versatility of the next size larger device.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great Panavise quality
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly versatile kit, much more substantial than the inexpensive sets with dozens of flimsy plastic bits.
customer_reviews.author: Pico de Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Great suction cup.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great suction cup. I use it with an adapter for my cell phone in my car. I had another one, Garmin brand that was always falling off my windshield when the sun was hot. I do not have that problem with this one.
customer_reviews.author: b5b72UofM

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, no vibration while driving down the horrible North ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product. I bought two of the single knuckle models. Your car isn't fast enough to make the suction cup come loose, I promise you that! Very sturdy, no vibration while driving down the horrible North Carolina back roads. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon T Connors

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact, it is perfect for GoPro. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: BN Lavender

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: This mount is awesome! I’ve used it on my car, on a boat, on vacation, at home, it works great and allows you to get the perfect angle,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great suction, very low profile
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my Akaso EK7000 Pro that I use as a dash cam. Overall, I am very satisfied with this product. Even though the product feels cheap because of the plastic texture, it was very sturdy and the suction is VERY TIGHT.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Alibadbad

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Have used on hood and side of car for video shoot, held very well!
customer_reviews.author: T. R. L.

customer_reviews.title: ts been on the side of my truck for 4 weeks and still on.
customer_reviews.text: ordered this one and a better one, no camera on it, but its been on the side of my truck for 4 weeks and still on.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Panavise Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase and I love this product - the only wish I had was to have it be able to more accessory selections that would be able to adapt to other products. But never the less I make it work and love the product
customer_reviews.author: Bill McCall

customer_reviews.title: It's Really Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks! So much so that you can hardly remove it from your windshield.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Marcos Studios

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality and vise grip on my windshield. The mount is easy to change out.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Seeker

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Cup provides excellent suction
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Cup provides excellent suction. Feels secure. Gives peace of mind. Versatile settings allow for better shots.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Panavise Actiongrip
customer_reviews.text: This actual was an order for my daughter to give her husband.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J Alvey

customer_reviews.title: Stayed on like a boss in multiple carwash runs
customer_reviews.text: On a client shoot I hung a GoPro on several places outside my car and drove through a car wash over a dozen times. The suction cup never came off and once I tighten the bolt on the camera everything stayed in place. If you want to see the end result here it is:
customer_reviews.author: Jorge L. Saury

customer_reviews.title: Good mount, some metal parts
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be one of the good quality, part metal, Panavise mounts that I have previously purchased. If it holds up as well as the original, I'll have years and years of service life ahead of me.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Stroud

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to hold a GoPro inside my 3D printer ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to hold a GoPro inside my 3D printer. It sticks to the plastic door without issue and allows quite a bit of adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Best window mount in a car for a GoPro.
customer_reviews.text: Tried a couple of others. They stayed on the window just like this one but they shook because of the weight of the Hero 3 on long arms. This one has no arm but still allows me to position the camera level on any windshield I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Leonard

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: very good for its size, tried it on my storm door for a quick time lapse. Then took it on a 30 minute drive on the outside of my car window, it held strong. I used it with a lightweight GoPro and Yi 4k cameras. For a regular size DSLR camera it might be a little too small, but I think it will work ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my go pro, to mount ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my go pro, to mount it to my drag car. No issues with it slipping or falling off running a 9.80
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - Perfect for Close Quarters, Vibration Free Windshield Mounting!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a vibration-free, close quarters, windshield mount for a GoPro Hero 4! Same mount and mechanism as the stock GoPro suction cup model!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Langton

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality at the right price point
customer_reviews.text: I'd say I love it but I also bought their phone holder and that was a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Wont stick to dash
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be able to set my vlog camera up in my car and it absolutely won't stick whether you follow the directions or not. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn Doty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: can't beat the original suction cup that gopro choosed for their own mounts.
customer_reviews.author: METIS Real Estate

customer_reviews.title: It will fall off after one or two minutes
customer_reviews.text: The suction cup is not working, causing the camera to fall off after one or two minutes.. The customer service isn't helpful at all.
customer_reviews.author: Zhuang Zhongfang

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best suction cup mount!
customer_reviews.text: Superior suction cup strength and very sturdy metal and composite materials. Definitely the best GoPro suction cup on the market bar none.
customer_reviews.author: Charles and Lei

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This unit performed beautifully and held fast outside of my car at sustained speeds of 70 mph.
customer_reviews.author: exaramco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This secures my GoPro and Contour cameras really well. I may even buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Timmayyy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for small action cams. Can articulate much better than the GoPro ones.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Haleston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds up to high speeds. Currently attached to my Shoei and never has an issue.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very strong mounts, I used them to mount cameras on a UGV and they held perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Calandra

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Very strong suction and solidly-built. used it to hold a GoPro to the windshield on a trip. No vibration in video.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on a three day trip to PA the weekend after I received with excellent results. The was easy to use, stayed attached to the windshield the entire time and was very stable even on rough roads. I would purchase another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works perfectly.. very handy tool to have in ...
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly.. very handy tool to have in your video / photography arsenal..
customer_reviews.author: webi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and easy to use very reliable with various cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Momo2012

customer_reviews.title: Ran a Flip Camera off this on a Jeep offroad ...
customer_reviews.text: Ran a Flip Camera off this on a Jeep offroad run on the McGrew trail in southern oregon. Mounted it to the cowl outside the jeep and was solid, Also ran it down the freeway at 65 mph with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Merwin

customer_reviews.title: I don't have to worry about my nice camera falling off
customer_reviews.text: This really grips well, I don't have to worry about my nice camera falling off.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Reliable suction clamp
customer_reviews.text: Confidence inspiring when attaching your GoPro to a speeding car! Did not loosen up at all during spirited Porsche fun run.
customer_reviews.author: Doug R.

customer_reviews.title: it holds great and has great range of motion
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with mount, it holds great and has great range of motion.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Csanadi

customer_reviews.title: Over promises does not deliver!
customer_reviews.text: Adjusting this thing is trial and error, even w full suction and everything tighten to the max the mount is wobbly. VERY DISAPPOINTED w this product it is plastic garbage and one cannot rely on it to function as it states in its listing DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME!
customer_reviews.author: ctd3

customer_reviews.title: Suction Cup did not function on a surfboard/lost GoPro Hero 4
customer_reviews.text: had the suction cup mounted on a kids surfboard from our mission group & the suction cup failed & GoPro Hero 4 was lost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead On Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived safely, well packaged and in a nice custom (but knock-off) 'Pelican' style case. The Transmitter is defective. Display is missing text and icons, but the orange backlight works as expected. Returned for refund, ordering a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: FordAnglia

customer_reviews.title: Solid.
customer_reviews.text: Solid little mount. It doesn't look as strong as it actually is but I have trusted panavise for a while now and this device hooks positively and securely to the point you wonder if it is going to damage something. This kit is a bit like a rubes goldberg machine until you read the instructions and then it just gives you a ton of options.
customer_reviews.author: JWill

customer_reviews.title: Panivise cam holder
customer_reviews.text: This has everything I need to travel with. The suction cup is a plus and varies angles to fit your needs.
customer_reviews.author: cj smith

product_meta.title: Panavise AcitonGrip 13130 Action Grip Double Knuckle Suction Cup Camera Mount (Matte Black)
product_meta.description: Style:Double KnuckleThe Action Grip Double Knuckle is a double ball suction cup camera mount that gives you maximum articulation. This mount has the "Tilt, Turn and Rotate" feature both at the camera and mount. Position your camera exactly where you need it. Comes with both 1/4-20 mounting ball and Gore ball.
feature_bullets: Two adjusting points for maximum adjustability
GoPro 3-axis adapter features Panavise ball for Tilt, Turn and Rotate. No more linking together various pieces to point the camera where you need it. Infinite adjustability!
